price: Sakın Allah’ın rasûllerine verdiği sözden geri döneceğini sanma!  Şüphesiz Allah çok güçlüdür, intikam sahibidir.
arabic: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِهِۦ رُسُلَهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٞ ذُو ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: falā taḥsabanna al-laha mukh'lifa waʿdihi rusulahu inna al-laha ʿazīzun dhū intiqāmin
